name: OVER LIMIT
description:
OVER LIMIT is a Tower Defense Game. Play the captain of Team Bravo, jump in Abyss and find the KEY to the hell's gate. All you need is the support from your teammates: 2 girls.

Story:
The world was attacked by monsters that people had never seen before, and the military was convinced that they came from the depths of hell - in a large mine in Russia. Your team is chosen to break into the abyss to find the key to the gates of hell. You are the hope of mankind.

Features:
2 Skills to help your fight with Cumon(a demon that has a human like).
2 Gamemode for you: Normal and Endless.
7 Turrets wait for your command.

ATTENTION: This game won't have Adult DLC.
